resources.string: As club service, develops strategies for membership development and retention, Monitors attendance, Oversees the productions and dristribution of the club bulletin and plans fellowship activities for the membership.

As international service, primarily responsibility for seeking opportunities to enhance knowledge and understanding of worldwide needs and problems, to developing activities to give service for promoting international understanding and goodwill toward all people and responsible for initiating and planning one major activity each year which shall involve all or most of the club membership.

As community service, primarily responsible for seeking opportunities to enhance knowledge and understanding of local community needs and problems, formulating and developing appropriate activities for serving the local community and responsible for initiating and planning one major activity each year which shall involve all or most of the club membership.

As professional development director (PDD), to reviews suggestions and develops plans to provide opportunities for professional development for the club membership developing programs designed to provide information about a wide cross - section of businesses and professions and developing programs to stimulate awareness and acceptance of high ethical standards in business and professional life.
